projects.title: Off-Grid Odyssey
projects.description: One of the first projects I worked on in my course. It is a choose your own adventure game that saves in player input, saves it in local storage, and displays a different output based on the input. It utilizes storage elements to display the high score page and dom manipulation. This website uses vanilla javascript.
